items.content_html: A lightweight Javascript library for handling hotkeys. No external dependencies.
items.title: rameel/ramstack.hotkey.js: A lightweight Javascript library for handling hotkeys. No external dependencies.

items.content_html: `sqlparser-devexpress` is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL `WHERE` clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.
items.title: RohitM-IN/SQLParser:  `sqlparser-devexpress` is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL `WHERE` clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.

items.content_html: A lightweight and developer-friendly OAuth 2.0 client library for secure authentication and seamless token management. OAuthx simplifies the integration of OAuth 2.0 authentication flows, including authorization code, PKCE and refresh token handling.
items.title: maniSHarma7575/OAuthx: A lightweight and developer-friendly OAuth 2.0 client library for secure authentication and seamless token management. OAuthx simplifies the integration of OAuth 2.0 authentication flows, including authorization code, PKCE and refresh token handling.

items.content_html: - Your Task Management Solution Trackify is a lightweight Kanban-style task tracker to efficiently manage tasks and projects. It helps you organize tasks into To-Do, In Progress, and Completed sections, ensuring smooth workflow and progress tracking. ✨ Features: ✔ Easy task organization ✔ Visual progress tracking ✔ Clean & minimal UI ✔ Dynamic
items.title: surajraj-dev/Trackify-:  - Your Task Management Solution   Trackify is a lightweight Kanban-style task tracker to efficiently manage tasks and projects. It helps you organize tasks into To-Do, In Progress, and Completed sections, ensuring smooth workflow and progress tracking.  ✨ Features: ✔ Easy task organization ✔ Visual progress tracking ✔ Clean & minimal UI ✔ Dynamic
